name: Flashy Wiz
description:
A wizard with a gambling problem, set out to to crush any opponent...WITH FIRE! This is an RPG with slot machine elements which allows you to play with only one hand or one butt cheek. Whichever you prefer man, I don't judge.

Controls:

Pay attention because the controls are complicated!

Space to stop the slot machine spinning.

A game by:

  • Vilius Drumsta
  • Matthew Murphy

Created for One Button Game Jam
